segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children over by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really going for it, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the 'COOKIE JAR,' what a little rascal!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh dear, that stool looks incredibly unstable, doesn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted precariously, almost as if it's about to topple backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically feel the tension in the air as he balances there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, anticipating that sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely engrossed in their secret cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile to see such determined mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just screams 'accident waiting to happen.'
segments.speaker: PAR
